front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE Standard for Information technology -- Smart transducer interface for sensors and actuators -- Part 4: Mixed-mode communication protocols and Transducer Electronic Data Sheet (TEDS) formats

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard defines the protocol and interface that allows analog transducers to communicate digital information with an IEEE 1451 object. It also defines the format of the Transducer TEDS. The Transducer TEDS is based on the IEEE 1451.2â„¢ TEDS. The standard does not specify the transducer design, signal conditioning, or the specific use of the TEDS.
